resources.string: Miles of open fields and rock formations, where millions of jellyfish live. It is also a popular place for jellyfishing.
A forest on the outskirts of Bikini Bottom. Instead of trees there are giant clumps of kelp trees all held together to form a spooky forest. Inside, it includes a camping area.
A brine pool that the residents of Bikini Bottom use as an underwater beach. Goo Lagoon contains sea caves, a pier amusement park, and other attractions.
Several large mountains that are a popular underwater ski resort. The main mountains are Guppy Mound, Flounder Hill, and Sand Mountain.
A large area for manufacturing that contains green slime from the industrial waste.
Field of dark grayish-blue colored undersea volcanic vents that shoot out sulfur, the sky is tinted an orange color due to this.
Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy secret hideout hidden in the basement of the Shady Shoals Retirement Home. Mermaid Man stores the Invisible Boat-Mobile here.
Where couples go to make out in their cars and/or have a picnic. It is located high on a cliff ridge just outside of Bikini Bottom. It is located on Coral Cliffs, behind Mt. Climb-Up-And-Fall-Off.
Patches of land filled with Brain Coral located near Jellyfish Fields.

the tallest free-standing structure and observation tower in Bikini Bottom. It is the Bikini Bottom equivalent of the Space Needle. It is also one of the most popular tourist attractions, as the observation deck has a great view of Bikini Bottom as seen in the Battle for Bikini Bottom video game.
Barg N Mart is one of the main supermarkets in Bikini Bottom.
The Bikini Bottom Supermarket is a shop in Bikini Bottom which has a huge red building.
A four-story mall in the shape of a ship.
A Novelty Shop and Prank Store that sells pranks, gags, and gross-out toys.
A hat shop which shaped like a pink bomb and has a large sign that reads its name in red letters.
A store that specializes in magic.
A comic book store in Bikini Bottom.
A store that sells baby clothes.
Goofy Goobers Ice Cream Party Boat
Most successful restaurant located downtown. It is owned by Eugene H. Krabs. The meal most customers order is a Krabby Patty.

A fast food restaurant owned by Sheldon Plankton and Karen Plankton, the restaurant is a major competitor of the Krusty Krab. The Chum Bucket is shaped like a big gray metal bucket, the handle held up by a grayish blue gloved hand.
A small boat made into a diner with neon lights on the side displaying DINER and a jukebox in it.
A fancy restaurant where dates take place and entrepreneurs eat.
An ice cream parlor that features a seating area with a stage, and a Nut Bar. Mascot is "Goofy Goober", a peanut. Products sold are Goober meals (with a toy) and Triple Gooberberry Sunrises.
A restaurant/bar for tough fish. It is believed to be stricter and tougher than other sailor clubs, and only the toughest of creatures are granted entrance.
A restaurant where "weenies" hang out. There is a robot waiter who serves soda and hot dogs.
FThe Fry Cook Museum is where people can look at fry-cook-related items, including the Golden Spatula, which many people have tried to take out of rock hard ancient grease.
It is a museum entirely dedicated to hooks.
The building resembles a Viking ship. Inside, it contains ancient artifacts and other relics, such as formerly the Atlantean amulet.
A boat museum in Bikini Bottom.
